import React, {useState, useEffect} from 'react' import { useGlobalContext} from "../../context/context"; import balanceImg from '../../assets/balance.svg'; const Stats = () => { const { playerData } = useGlobalContext(); const [serviceCompleted, setServiceCompleted] = useState(0); useEffect(() => { let newServiceCompleted = Math.floor(((Date.now() - playerData.player.serviceTimestamp) / playerData.player.timeForService) * 100); setServiceCompleted(newServiceCompleted); }, [playerData]); return ( <>
{playerData.player.balance}

Service {playerData.player.typeOfService}

{playerData.player.amountOfAvailableService}

+1
{`${serviceCompleted}%`}

Upgrade

{`${playerData.player.amountOfOtherService1}`}×{`${playerData.player.typeOfOtherService1}`}
+
0 × C
Stake
) }; export default Stats
